com.csis.reminder.dao

Class UserDAO

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.csis.reminder.dao.UserDAO
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class UserDAO
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
    Author:
    Reminder Group Class is responsible for managing the User Data Access Object it contains the methods which allow us to perform CRUD operations on our users
    See Also:
